ygData.subject: Re: Phobia is now a free agent-hail to new  ship
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia was preoccupied, he still had his spies inside the Destron base, that wasn t the issue. The things bothering him were the new ships. One crashed with at

Return-Path: <cyberwolf4@...>
Received: (qmail 23445 invoked from network); 6 Jul 2000 19:47:29 -0000
Received: from unknown (10.1.10.27) by m1.onelist.org with QMQP; 6 Jul 2000 19:47:29 -0000

X-eGroups-Return: cyberwolf4@...
Received: from [10.1.10.111] by hm.egroups.com with NNFMP; 06 Jul 2000 19:47:27 -0000
Date: Thu, 06 Jul 2000 19:47:20 -0000
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Subject: Re: Phobia is now a free agent-hail to new  ship
Message-ID: <8k2no8+nmtn@...>
In-Reply-To: <20000706193449.18497.qmail@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 15739
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: cyberwolf4@...

Phobia was preoccupied, he still had his spies inside the Destron 
base, that wasn't the issue. The things bothering him were the new 
ships. One crashed with at least one survivor, another was big enough 
to wipe this planet clean of life. He lowered his hands and set a 
course for the Maximal base. With any luck the transport ship he was 
in wouldn't be considered a threat. "Set shields on full so we can't 
be scanned." The ship did as it was told and they began thier decent.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> wrote:
> 
>  
> Maximal ship. We know one of you has survived. Plese reply if 
assistance is needed.
>   cyberwolf4@p... wrote: 
> Phobia scanned the planet for any signs of landin from the object 
his 
> ship detected. He found a crater with the remains of a small ship. 
> more detailed scans showed no signs of its pilot. Phobia knew that 
> he'd have to eliminate this newcomer just in case he had any 
> information about the mysterious spider.
> "Ship, this is Phobia speaking, set a course for the crash site."
> He turned to Pantron, "Keep trying to reach the survivor, I want to 
> know who I'm dealing with.If it responds don't tell him there are 
two 
> of us."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> wrote:
> > 
> >  Yup
> > 
> >   CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote: 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > You mean this one, and the last one right?
> > 
> > ----- Original Message ----- 
> > From: ddsg sdgfd 
> > To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 9:03 AM
> > Subject: Re: Phobia is now a free agent
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > My reason for risking deliation. Well there is only one reason. I 
> was made to serve magmatron.(stated in first arrival.) But when i 
> landed my circutry was damaged. Messing with my logic circuts. It 
> made me question everything since I arrived. So now Im trying to 
find 
> who I belive is the one who will be able to win this war. And I 
know 
> whoever that is. You will be on that side. That in my book is 
worthy 
> enough to risk deliation. 
> > (You can have your guns, they just have to remain deactivated, 
> > activate them and you're history. Past, present, and future, 
these 
> > temporal things are confusing.)
> > 
> > "What are your goals Pantron? I know why I'm here, what's your 
> > reason? You picked now to abandon the only leader you have on 
this 
> > planet,. You must have a reason for existence." Phobia's studied 
> > cybertrons past, he knows enough about the great war to get by. 
He 
> > studies Pantron, thinking of all the defectors in the past, 
> > Starscream, Foxfingers, Darvolt, all betrayed thier leaders, just 
> to 
> > end up as particles splattered on the side of an asteroid 
> somewhere. 
> > So why was Pantron willing to risk deleation?
> > 
> > (Starscream was destroyed by Galvatron, Foxfingers stole an 
> artifact 
> > from the Autobots and was killed by an older model of Shockwave.
> > (Another RPG I was involved with, and Da! rvolt pledged 
allegiance 
> to 
> > Unicron. Niether side took kindly to that. Again another RPG)
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> wrote:
> > > 
> > >  
> > > 
> > > Pantron thought over the question. I guess I came because I 
> needed 
> > to. Im a destron. I had served under magmatron for a VERY long 
> time. 
> > But he has grown ignorant in his age. He doesnt see the big 
> picture. 
> > So now im trying to find the onbe person who has the same goals 
as 
> i 
> > do. I belive that to be you. After that pantron thought of his 
own 
> > question. Can I pick up my guns. Still offline?Phobia smiled a 
sly 
> > smile. He knew Pantron,s life was in his hands. 
> > > Scanners showed Pantrons weapons were still offlin, and with 
the 
> > ship 
> > > set for his voice commands, there wasn't anything Pantron could 
> do 
> > to 
> > > doublecross the spider. External scans showed no sign of 
> > transformer 
> > > life so he figured the Predicons weren't ! interested in him or 
> his 
> > > new "friend".
> > > 
> > > "So Pantron, what brings you to this side of the universe?"
> > > 
> > > Phobia suspected that the Ark was a big reason for all the 
> activity 
> > > on this planet, but he somehow knew there was more. All he had 
to 
> > do 
> > > was find out just how much more.
> > > 
> > > He set the ships controls for a high orbit to avoid any 
> planetside 
> > > sensors, and kept to the sunny side of Earth so sunspot 
activity 
> > > might hide any approaching ships. Three ships have arrived 
since 
> he 
> > > got there, he didn't want to take the chance of a forth.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > >  
> > > > 
> > > >  Pantron watched as the ship landed. He walked aboard and 
> > prepared 
> > > to meet phobia cyberwolf4@p... wrote: 
> > > > Phobias eyes lit up after hearing what Pantron had just told 
> him. 
> > ! > He 
> > > > doubted the information about the key, but the mention of the 
> Ark 
> > > > confirmed his suspicions. He was on Earth, the damn planet 
that 
> > got 
> > > > the origional Megatron killed. (transformers the Movie 
Megatron 
> > was 
> > > > wounded in the Earth battle, and later thrown into space by 
> > > > Starscream.) Phobia knew of the great war , not being 
> programmed 
> > as 
> > > a 
> > > > historian, he never bothered to download all the datatracks.
> > > > 
> > > > Phobia almost admired Pantron. Pantron was unarmed and 
> > defenseless, 
> > > > saying all the right things to stay alive. He could tell a 
> > survivor 
> > > > when he saw one, and right now Pantron was despeate enough to 
> > side 
> > > > with Phobia to stay that way.
> > > > 
> > > > "Computer, set all controls to my voice, lock on to my 
vitals. 
> If 
> > > my 
> > > > vitals drop, land on top of the nearest translifefor! m and 
> > detonate."
> > > > 
> > > > Phobia didn't trust anyone except himself, and even that was 
a 
> > thin 
> > > > trust.
> > > > 
> > > > "I'm landing Pantron prepare to come aboard."
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > >

> > > > >

> and 
> > > > disarmed them. He was takeing a very large chance here. The 
bot 
> > > could 
> > > > destroy him at any time. " I have information you want. I 
have 
> > been 
> > > > around for a long time. I was around when Rodimus Prime was 
> > > crowned. 
> > > > You need me but I need you more. Also I have a key to the 
ark. 
> It 
> > > > will give us the power to fly it if we ever get a hold of the 
> > ark. 
> > > It 
> > > > was given to me by a friend. He stole it when he helped 
> megatron 
> > >! > steal the golden discs. Please let us talk."Pantron heard 
the 
> > > > rumbling of engines above him. He turned to see 
> > > > > Phobias ship lowering itself towards the ground.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Phobia wasn,t sure if the other Predicons had gotten his 
> > message, 
> > > > he 
> > > > > figured Pantron had information that the Predicon army 
would 
> > > want. 
> > > > If 
> > > > > they weren't interested then he certainly was. In war it 
> isn't 
> > > who 
> > > > > has the most firepower, it was who has the most detailed 
> > > > information.
> > > > > 
> > > > > The ooutside intercom opened, and with a booming resonance 
> > > Phobias 
> > > > > voice came alive. "Pantron, transform to your beast mode 
(If 
> he 
> > > > > already isn't) and step forward. You are being scanned, 
> disarm 
> > > your 
> > > > > weapons and we'll talk. Until then I will consid! er you as 
> big a 
> > > > > threat as Magmatron. I think you know what I'd do to him in 
> > this 
> > > > > situation, don't you." Phobia knew either way he held an 
> > > unbeatable 
> > > > > hand.
> > > > >

swindled

find.

map

> > > > this 
> > > > > > planet meet me at coordinates 9211-8 (What will one day 
be

> > > > > > Japan.) If youcan arrange transportation. Keep radio

> > > > > > > > Predicon signatures.
